title: What totally awesome TV character are you?
description: The 80's was filled with totoally awesome TV characters.  Take this quiz to see which one you are!
question: Which statement best describes you?

answers.label: The older you get, the better you get, unless you're a banana.
I might be misunderstood, but that won't stop me from doing the dance of joy.
Nobody messes with my ride, fool!
I'm as flexible as they come and can trasform to meet the needs of any situation.
I'm street smart and I've got awesome style.
I know that that to make the best of a sticky situation all you need is duct tape.

responses.name: Punky Brewster
responses.description: Life is tough, but you're spunky, Punky. You wear your determined spirit everywhere you go and won't let life get you down.

responses.name: Balki Bartokomous
responses.description: Is there anyone more aweome than you? Well, of course not, don't be ridiculous! Borat who? You are the original east European hipster.

responses.name: MacGyver
responses.description: You are so awesome that you have your own voice-over narration. And, you totally rock a mullet. There's no situation you can't get out of with a little duct tape, a Swiss army knife, and your encyclopedic knowledge of all things science.

responses.name: Manimal
responses.description: It's a falcon! It's a puma!  No, it's Manimal. The cat's out of the bag - you can transform yourself to whatever creature the situation calls for. The only remaining mystery is where does your three-piece suit go?

responses.name: Alf
responses.description: Or, as you're known back home on Melmac, Gordon Schumway. For someone who's home planet exploded and has a bizarre craving for eating felines, you're quite plucky.  Or maybe that's just all the beer you drink, Ha!

responses.name: Rose Nylund
responses.description: Your nonsensical ramblings often leave everyone else speechless, but they love you anyway.  And that Minnesotan accent? Ya can barely notice it ya know?

responses.name: B.A. Baracus
responses.description: I pity the fool who messes with you. You're the original bad motherf***er. 'Nuff said. Now get lost, fool!
